attributes.action: Query Ofcom proposal - Radio 2 must have 3 hours of news per week at peak times
attributes.additional_details: Richard Littlejohn provides his opinion at http://www.dailymail.co.uk/debate/article-4366494/RICHARD-LITTLEJOHN-Hey-Ofcom-leave-Radio-2-alone.html
attributes.background: Ofcom’s principal duty is to further the interests of citizens and of consumers.That should not extend to meddling with Radio 2 scheduling

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
